channel.title: Repository on Vanilla Forums Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Repository on Vanilla Forums Documentation

item.title: Code Repository
item.description: This feature is only available on Vanilla Cloud Learn More... Shared Private Repository Our VIP plans come with the option to open a private code repository that you share with the Vanilla Forums team on GitHub. This allows your developers to view and contribute to your custom features and theme. Setup Your customer success manager will provide you with this repository. Please allow the Vanilla team to organize its structure appropriately and name files.
